ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Revelation sent down from the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It has been revealed by the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a revelation from the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (This Quran) is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Sent down by the Lord Of The Creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A revelation from the Lord of all that exists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A revelation by the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: a sending down from the Lord of all Being.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is a revelation sent down from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: sent down gradually from the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A Revelation (this Quran) from the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: a sending down from the Lord of all the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:80] a revelation, revealed, by the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A revelation) a speech (from the Lord of the Worlds) unto Muhammad (pbuh).
